channel.description:

item.title: RT João Moura: Re @LangChainAI was one of the first libs to build abstractions around LLMs, it had to expand fast, great to see it now reorganize its...
item.description:
RT João Moura
Re @LangChainAI was one of the first libs to build abstractions around LLMs, it had to expand fast, great to see it now reorganize itself and mature in this industry


Harrison Chase: It's out! LangChain v0.1.0 comes out with an improved package architecture for stability and production readiness, as well a focus on:

👀Observability
↔️Integrations
🔗Composability
🎏Streaming
🧱Output Parsing
🔎Retrieval
🤖Agents
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Paul Bratslavsky | codingafterthirty: I am too lazy to manually write YouTube descriptions but not lazy enough to build the thing that does it. Exp...
item.description:
RT Paul Bratslavsky | codingafterthirty
I am too lazy to manually write YouTube descriptions but not lazy enough to build the thing that does it. Exploring @nextjs @strapijs @LangChainAI in this new project. While I am working on this one, here is another Next JS and Strapi Project Example 👉🏼 https://github.com/strapi/strapi-next-14-dashboard-demo
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Taranjeet: Re @hwchase17 Congratulations @hwchase17 & @LangChainAI team. Langchain has been super helpful in embedchain’s development.
item.description:
RT Taranjeet
Re @hwchase17 Congratulations @hwchase17 & @LangChainAI team.

Langchain has been super helpful in embedchain’s development.
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Ankush Gola: Big milestone!
item.description:
RT Ankush Gola
Big milestone!


LangChain: 🦜🚀LangChain v0.1.0

After a year of development, we've released LangChain v0.1.0

Read the full blog here: https://blog.langchain.dev/langchain-v0-1-0/

After talking with the users and developers, we released this stable version and focused the library on a few core areas:

👀Observability:… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1744411643482951829
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Joel Alexander: 🌟New🌟 tutorial on improving a Q&A over financial docs RAG app with evals and tracing using @PareaAI. Shoutout to @LangChainAI...
item.description:
RT Joel Alexander
🌟New🌟 tutorial on improving a Q&A over financial docs RAG app with evals and tracing using @PareaAI. Shoutout to @LangChainAI , http://unstructured.io, and @Redisinc for the supporting tech! Docs:  https://lnkd.in/einMxN8n
Links for the repo and demo video are in the comments.
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Harrison Chase: 🦜🕸️LangGraph is a LangChain extension that makes it really easy to define agents as graphs If you look at all the papers abo...
item.description:
RT Harrison Chase
🦜🕸️LangGraph is a LangChain extension that makes it really easy to define agents as graphs

If you look at all the papers about agents, they describe and visualize agents as graphs - so why shouldn't we have an easy way to create them that way?


LangChain: 🦜🕸️LangGraph

⚡ Building language agents as graphs ⚡

https://github.com/langchain-ai/langgraph

The "one more thing" from our LangChain v0.1.0 announcement is introducing LangGraph to the world

🤖We've been alpha testing this over the past six months as a better way to create LLM agents… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1744419476882473391
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Adam Silverman (Hiring!): Re @hwchase17 This is huge. Great work @hwchase17 + @LangChainAI team!
item.description:
RT Adam Silverman (Hiring!)
Re @hwchase17 This is huge. Great work @hwchase17 + @LangChainAI team!
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Roger Taylor: Snakes slithering! Enric Domingo demos how to pit #LLMs against each other in a 1v1 Snake game with Streamlit. Using OpenCV, @Langcha...
item.description:
RT Roger Taylor
Snakes slithering!
Enric Domingo demos how to pit #LLMs against each other in a 1v1 Snake game with Streamlit. Using OpenCV, @LangchainAI & OpenAI, it's a unique benchmark for prompts & models🐍

📜Code: http://buff.ly/4aPVPiK
📚: https://buff.ly/3tJIuIb

http://buff.ly/3TSZcj5

item.title: RT Richárd Hruby: Re @LangChainAI v0.1.0 is out. The first stable version of LangChain. This is HUGE, let's go 🚀 Congrats to @hwchase17 and the wh...
item.description:
RT Richárd Hruby
Re @LangChainAI v0.1.0 is out. The first stable version of LangChain. This is HUGE, let's go 🚀

Congrats to @hwchase17 and the whole team on the launch! 👏

Read the blog post below: https://blog.langchain.dev/langchain-v0-1-0/
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Tomaz Bratanic: Built a @LangChainAI template that demonstrates a semantic layer on top of @neo4j and a dedicated repository that with a Streamlit ...
item.description:
RT Tomaz Bratanic
Built a @LangChainAI template that demonstrates a semantic layer on top of @neo4j and a dedicated repository that with a Streamlit interface. The semantic layer equips the agent with a suite of robust tools, allowing it to interact with the graph based on the user's intent.
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🐀Improved RAGatouille <> LangChain Integration We really enjoyed @bclavie's new RAGatouille library. It makes advanced retrieval techniques (like C...
item.description:
🐀Improved RAGatouille <> LangChain Integration

We really enjoyed @bclavie's new RAGatouille library. It makes advanced retrieval techniques (like ColBERT - more on that below) really easy to use

We've worked on a tighter integration to make it *super simple* to use RAGatouille… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1744080648481260015
item.author: LangChain

item.title: Our friends at @UnstructuredIO are a great way to ingest unstructured data @Dev__Digest recently made an awesome tutorial showing how to us them with ...
item.description:
Our friends at @UnstructuredIO are a great way to ingest unstructured data

@Dev__Digest recently made an awesome tutorial showing how to us them with LangChain.js. Shows how to do question-answering over third party data

Check it out!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2B161Dpvyxw
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🤖✂️How to Web Scrape Wikipedia with LLM Agents We ♥️ this tutorial by Kenneth Leung. It shows how to take a CSV of entities and then use an age...
item.description:
🤖✂️How to Web Scrape Wikipedia with LLM Agents

We ♥️ this tutorial by Kenneth Leung. It shows how to take a CSV of entities and then use an agent to populate information about those entities by looking things up on Wikipedia

Many real-world use cases!

https://medium.datadriveninvestor.com/how-to-web-scrape-wikipedia-using-llm-agents-f0dba8400692
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT João Moura: 🤖 AI Agents create Instagram post using crewAI FOR FREE ✨🚣 This runs entirely on OpenHermes 2.5 from @Teknium1 and @NousResearc...
item.description:
RT João Moura
🤖 AI Agents create Instagram post using crewAI FOR FREE ✨🚣

This runs entirely on OpenHermes 2.5 from @Teknium1 and @NousResearch using @OLLAMA

If you like this follow me for more on AI Agents and all things LLM

crewAI, is an AI Agent framework built on top of @LangChainAI
